name: Word Woes
description: Posts about challenges in text editors like Word like formatting issues, inserting figures.

name: Networking Woes
description: Posts about networking challenges such as setting up home router, ssh server, vpn tunnels, and diagnosing slow networks.

name: Display Issues
description: Posts about display issues such as dual monito, recovering computer from sleep. Also includes questions about display in different browsers.

name: Computer Concerns
description: Included inquiry posts about determining if a memory card would work, motherboard questions,graphic card woes.

name: Outlook/Email Woes
description: Posts mainly about email issues like sharing calendars and contacts in email providers like Outlook.

name: Partition Woes
description: Posts about partition challenges such as partition not being visible, dual booting.

name: Excel/Word hacks
description: Posts about Microsoft Excel operations usch as VBA macros, functions.

name: Video Woes
description: Posts about video issues such as using ffmpeg to convert video,combine videos
